Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Bowl
Description: Semispherical bowl with a wide mouth, a rounded, slightly inward turning rim, curved walls and a stable flat-bottomed base. Grayish-coloured paste. Interior and exterior surface covered with a light gray coating. On the rim (outer and inner) the bowl shows a narrow painted band of a dark gray colour.
